casebody.data:
Barry HIRSCHBERG and Elizabeth Hirschberg, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
BOROUGH OF NORTHVALE PLANNING BOARD, Borough of Northvale, Jorge Perez, Emma Perez, Defendants,
and
Ner Family Associates, LLC, Defendant-Respondent. C-256 September Term 2018
080967 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 30, 2018
November 2, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004778-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
